sentences.sentence: Each constituency will return only one legislator.
sentences.translation: 每一选区只能有一位“立委”。

sentences.sentence: Which countries have the largest number of people per legislator?
sentences.translation: 哪些国家的议员代表最多数的人？

sentences.sentence: Last month Austin Badon, another state legislator, dropped out because he was finding it hard to raise money.
sentences.translation: 上个月，另一位州议会议员Austin Badon也因筹款困难而退出。
